title: The Clayton Citizen
additional-note: We do not know exactly when publication of this newspaper ended, but we have not found evidence of publication after 1916.  Our determination that all content is in the public domain is based on a 1916 end date.  (There was also an unrelated newspaper called 'The Clayton Citizen' published in Missouri later in the 20th century.)
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
